resources.string: Press button twice in order to exit
Access to the external storage is required to execute this app.\nDo you want to open the app settings?
Access to file management access is required,\nto access external storage.\nDo you want to open the management settings?
For the background communication overlay drawing is required.\nDo you want to open the app settings?
For the background communication notification are required.\nDo you want to open the app settings?
Storing settings failed. Please reinstall the application.
The settings have been stored at:
Bluetooth is not enabled.\nDo you want to enable it now?
Wi-Fi is not enabled.\nDo you want to enable it now or select the access point?
No valid configuration is present.\nDo you want to generate or select a configuration now?
No Bluetooth device has been selected.\nDo you want to select a device now?
There is not enough free space ({0:fs1} < {1:fs1}) on the device for storing the ECU files.\nDo you want to select a different storage media?
No ECU files have been found.
Updated ECU files are available for this application.
Do you want to download the ECU files now (File size approx. {0:fs1})?

This is an expert tool.
No liability for malfunction or damage at the vehicle.
This app requires a fast storage memory with a minimum free space of {0:fs1}.
The usage of the app is not allowed if this requirement is not accepted.
Only use configurations that exactly match the vehicle.\nGenerate configurations with the configuration generator, there is no support for using foreign configurations.

The ECU files have to be extracted (Size approx. {0:fs1}),
this requires the download of update information.
If the extraction is very slow please use a faster storage media.
Do you want to continue?

To extract the ECU files (Size approx. {0:fs1})
the download of update information is required.
If the extraction is very slow please use a faster storage media.
Do you want to continue?
The current manufacturer is {0}, to choose a different one select \'abort\'.
Please install an app first, that could open {0} files.
Please install a XML editor first.
Access to file denied.\nPlease check the file location and access rights.
Use long click and drag drop to change display order.
(Only relevant data is displayed,\nchangeable in the global settings.)
The error reset conditions have not been met.\nPlease stop the engine, turn on ignition and retry again.

This open source project is hosted at: github.com/uholeschak/ediabaslib Feel free to contribute or to report problems. A detailed documentation could also be found on this web site. Changes in this version:

- Start at boot option.
 - ELM327 firmware update.
- EDIABAS 7.6.0 with DoIP support.
- BMW database corrected.
- Yandex Cloud support.
- Android 14 support.
- Allow to change lines display order from menu.
- Configuration generator: Long click to change ECU order.
- Fixed minor problems
Deep OBD for BMW and VAG\nVersion: {0}\nId: {1}

The VAG mode ist still experimental and only for vehicles until {0}. A Deep OBD adapter with at least firmware version 0.11 is required. At the moment only the protocols KWP2000, KWP1281, TP2.0 and UDS are supported. Configurations have to regenerated for the new VAG mode .It's possible to select the old VAG mode again in the settings dialog.
An update is available at Google Play.
Do you want to show the update?\nYou could also skip this app version.
Would you like to enable downloading over cellular connections? Depending on your data plan, this may cost you money.
If you choose not to enable downloading over cellular connections, the download will automatically resume when wi-fi is available.

The app has not been downloaded from Google Play and the expansion file is missing.
Download the OBB file with an APK downloader from Google Play and copy it with the name:
'{0}'
in one of the directories:
{1}
There is no support, the usage of Google Play is the only recommend way.
The expansion file has not been found,\nthe app has to be restarted.

The expansion file:
{0}
is not readable.
Check the access permissions or delete the file.
Download failed because the app may not be downloaded from Google Play
Please wait, the start service is active.
The CPU idle usage is very high ({0}%), this could cause communication problems.\nPlease terminate background Apps that consume too much CPU power.

The app crashed during compilation of the user code.
There is a known compiler bug:
Don't use complex initialized structures or arrays in the code,
initialize them in the constructor.

The configuration has been created with a different BWM database, some entries may be incompatible.\nTo correct this, open every ECU, that is marked with * in the page title, in the configuration generator, check the entries and store the configuration again.

If you have problems with the automatic download of the ECU files you could download them from
{0}
and install them manually.
Do you want to use manual installation?
Download files failed.\nPlease check your network connection.
A proxy has been configured in the network settings.\nThis could cause connection problems.\nRemove the proxy if possible.
Do you want to extract the ECU files offline?
Extracting files failed.\nThe zip file seems to be corrupted.\nIn most cases the reason is a defective storage media.
Writing extracted files failed.\nIs the file system corrupted?\nIt\'s recommended to uninstall all file protection software (e.g. antivirus).
Writing files failed.\nIs there no space left on the device?\nIt\'s recommended to uninstall all file protection software (e.g. antivirus).
Reading of the configuration file failed.

The file or folder:
{0}
will be created.
Do you want to continue?

The file:
{0}
already exists.
Do you want to override it?

The file or folder:
{0}
will be deleted.
Do you want to continue?
Communication errors have occurred.\nDo you want to send a compressed and anonymous trace file (size {0:fs0}) to allow improvement of the product?
Communication errors have occurred.\nDo you want to send anonymous data to allow improvement of the product?
Sending trace file failed.\nPlease check your network connection.\nDo you want to retry sending?
You could retry sending later, with the following function of the main menu:\nResend trace file.
Do you want to retry sending?
Additional information (e.g. vehicle and adapter type, edge conditions):
Do you want to send the following optional information, to help improving the software?
Translation failed.\nPlease check your network connection.\nDo you want to retry the translation?
Translation failed with error:\n{0}.\nDo you want to retry the translation?
Do you want to enable automatic ECU text translation with {0}?\nThis requires an account and an API Key.
Do you want to store the API Key?

For automatic translation with {0} a (free) API key and account is required, that allows a limited amount of translations per day.
With the buttons below log in to your account and create a key or display your existing ones.
Copy the key from the web browser and paste it in the field below with the paste button.
To copy the key press and hold the first word, extend the selected range and choose copy.
Yandex Cloud additionally allows to use an OAuth token and a folder ID instead of an API key.
The Bluetooth service is connected, but delivers no data.\nA restricted mode will be used, please pair the devices in the phone menu.

For some Android radios it\'s recommended to replace the antenna cable of the internal Bluetooth module and lead it through the enclosure.\nThe antenna cable should have a length of 15.5 cm. For modules without cable a length of 16.0 cm seems to be optimal.
Android devices with Bluetooth module FSC-BW124 seem to have communication problems with the OBD adapters.\nConnection will probably not work correctly.

The Bluetooth module {0} has a limited communication channel and a special communication mode has to be use.\nFor technical reasons not all OBD protocols are supported in this mode and the latest adapter firmware is required.
The current Bluetooth pin {0} is not the default value {1} for the adapters.\nEither you change the adapter pin or the current Bluetooth pin.\nDo you want to change the current pin to {1}?

The current firmware version {0} is known to have Bluetooth communication problems.
Please downgrade or upgrade the firmware first (depending on availability).
Firmware download
Update instructions

Bluetooth connection to the adapter failed.
Please try to delete the adapter and connect it again to fix this problem.
Reconnecting the smartphone may also help to improve the communication.
Use OBD adapters with YC1021 (for newer Android radios) or BC417 (for older Android radios) Bluetooth chip.
Bluetooth connection to the adapter failed.\nIf another app uses the connection terminate the app or reboot the android device.
Adapter type detection failed.\nDo you still want to use this adapter (the telegrams will be send unmodified)?
Adapter type detection failed.\nDo you still want to use this adapter?
The direct communication mode is only useful for adapters without firmware or for flashing the adapter!\nCommunication with the car is not possible in the most cases!\nDo you want to continue anyway?
The ELM327 adapter is not supporting all required commands and is incompatible with this software.
The ELM327 adapter is a fake {0}.{1} version and is incompatible with this software.
The ELM327 adapter is not original and is not supporting all functions. Not all operations are possible.
The vehicle has no D-CAN support, communication with the ELM327 adapter is not possible.
Do you want to try anyway to use the adapter?

It\'s recommended to use an ELM327 v1.4b, v1.5 or origin v2.1 adapter,
which is based on PIC18F25K80 processor (no MCP2515 chip).
At github.com/uholeschak/ediabaslib an improved firmware could be found.\nOriginal Deep OBD adapters also contain a license for coding of one BMW vehicle.

ELM327 adapters are slow and only support D-CAN (vehicles starting from 3/2007).
You could now buy adapters with a replacement firmware at
github.com/uholeschak/ediabaslib
that has many improvements.\nOriginal Deep OBD adapters also contain a license for coding of one BMW vehicle.
It\'s recommend to update the adapter firmware first.\nDo you want open the OBDLink app to perform the update?
It\'s recommend to update the ELM327 firmware with the replacement firmware.\nDo you want to open the adapter configuration page for firmware update?
The adapter may require configuration.\nDo you want to open the adapter configuration page?
There is a firmware update available for this adapter.\nDo you want to open the adapter configuration page for update installation?
For this Bluetooth module type a firmware update of the OBD adapter is required.
Without access permissions searching for Bluetooth devices is not possible.\nDo you want to open the app settings?
The location services have to be enabled for Bluetooth device searching.\nDo you want to enable the location service?
The location services have to be enabled for Wi-Fi adapter detection.\nDo you want to enable the location service?
Enter the Bluetooth address of an already paired OBD adapter in the specified format
The Bluetooth address has not the correct format
Choose an operation for this device
You could copy files to and from the app directory in the global settings.
No data log tags are present.\nTo enable data logging, data log tags must be specified on the ECU page of the configuration generator.
The data logging is only temporary.\nTo store the setting, activate the option \'Store log data settings\' in the global settings.
Long click to select the directory or select \'.\' for the current one.
For a stable communication with the adapter it is recommended to pair any additional smartphone with the radio.\nDo you want to continue anyway?
The Bluetooth service is not active, please try to start the app again later.\nDo you want to continue anyway?
You are currently connected to a Wi-Fi adapter.\nFor internet access disconnection of the adapter is required.\nDo you want to disable Wi-Fi now?
The connected USB adapter uses a disabled fake FT232R chip.\nFor a stable connection it is recommended to use only original FTDI chips.
The default password for the adapter web interface is {0}.\nIf the adapter gets unreachable after configuration you have to open the adapter and press the reset button after the adapter has booted.
If you are using a Deep OBD BMW Wi-Fi adapter select the access point with the name \'Deep OBD BMW\', the default password is deepobdbmw.
You are not connected with a Deep OBD BMW, Unichip ENET or modBMW Wi-Fi adapter.\nDo you want to select a different access point?
If you are using a direct Ethernet cable connection, you have configure the Android LAN adapter with an Auto IP address,\nfor example 169.254.1.10 / 255.255.0.0.
You are not connected with an ELM327 Wi-Fi adapter.\nDo you want to select a different access point?
You are not connected with a Deep OBD Wi-Fi adapter.\nDo you want to select a different access point?
In hotspot mode you have to specify the adapter IP manually in the app menu.\nDo you want to do this now?
The battery voltage is very high ({0}V),\nthis could destroy the OBD adapter.\nPlease check the vehicle voltage regulator.
Auto hide title bar on main page when connected (show with long click and release)
Suppress unused title bars (show with swipe gesture)
Graphical display: Swap display orientation in multi window mode
For OBD network adapter internet connection via
Disable Bluetooth at exit, if unused and enabled by app
Device enters energy saving mode and the communication will be stopped
Auto connection establishment to vehicle and close App
Auto start the service at boot time to restore the last connection state
Double click required for app exit
For BMW vehicles with DS2 protocol always scan all ECUs (slow)
Copy file or directory from app
Delete file or directory from app
Collect debug information for trace files
The import file has not been found:
Do you also want to export private data?
The boot option is very often not working correctly on Android radios.
It\'s recommended to configure Deep OBD in the app manager to stay active in standby.

It\'s recommended to choose the second start option and keep Deep OBD always in foreground to make the app remain active after standby.\nWith other tools (e.g. Automation, Macrodroid) the app has to be launched after booting.
The boot option is only available if the app install location is internal.
The app could not be started.
Without arguments all errors are read
Without arguments all information are read
The following jobs could not be found in the ECU:
Depending on the ECU type the amount of arguments is limited.\nIf you select too many arguments no data will be transmitted.
Do you want to apply the selected arguments?
Do you want to continue the last aborted search?
Should the existing ECUs be removed?
Should all information (including XML files) be removed for this configuration?
Should all settings for this ECU be removed?
Do you want to read the complete ECU list from the vehicle again?
Multiple data tables have been found for this ECU.\nPlease choose the data table that best fits your ECU.\nIf the digit 7. and 8. of the VIN is present in the name, this table should be preferred.
No data tables have been found for this ECU

No response from vehicle.
For motorbikes you should enable the detect motorbikes option in the menu.
For K-LINE vehicles an USB or Deep OBD adapter is required.
Here you could find a list of supported adapters.
Do you want to switch to manual configuration?
No response from vehicle.\nDo you want to check the adapter connection?
No response from vehicle.\nThe direct communication mode is active and could be the source of the problem.\nDo you want to select a different adapter?
Do you want to save the configuration?
Do you want to save the configuration and use as active configuration?
You have selected no data to display.\nClick the ECUs and select the desired jobs and results.\nDo you want to save the configuration anyway?
Unable to get valid information for some ECUs.

A connection of the adapter pins 7 and 8 is required to detect more ECUs.\nFor vehicles with OBD I socket in the engine bay additionally the pin 8 of the OBD II socket has to be connected at the vehicle side.
The selected ECU page could not be opened.\nThe configuration has be to created with the configuration generator and the ECU must be reachable.
To execute service functions for an ECU, open the context menu of the ECU and select the entry \'service functions\'.

The service functions are still experimental!
The displayed jobs the Ediabas Tool may have only default arguments, that have to be adapted before job execution!
It's your responsibility to check the jobs before execution!
The argument assistant could be helpful in this case.
Because of data acquisition complexity it's possible, that in future the jobs require Deep OBD adapters for execution.
Do you want to continue anyway?
Long click the ECU to change the order.
Writing the configuration has been disabled in the configuration file.\nStoring of the modifications is not possible.
You have selected no data to display.\nFor this select the desired jobs and results first from the list.\nDo you want to abort anyway?
You have activated the graphical display, but not selected any graphical design.\nNo gauge will be displayed.\nDo you want continue anyway?
The selected function is not available.
The maximum number of arguments per request depends on the ECU type.\nIf the data is not displayed on the dashboard you have to reduce the \"Maximum arguments per request\".
If the workshop code, importer number or equipment number is 0 or too large the ECU may reject the values.\nDo you want to continue anyway?
The job arguments are out of range
Access denied, you have to use security access first
Write coding failed.\nIf the code was incorrect, switch the ignition off for 1-2 minutes before trying it again!
Login failed.\nIf the code was incorrect, switch the ignition off for 1-2 minutes before trying it again!
Security access failed.\nIf the code was incorrect, keep the ignition on for 10 minutes before trying it again!
Storing adaption channel 0 resets all adaption values
It\'s recommended to correct the coding in the ECU first.
BMW coding is only available for F series or higher.

BMW coding is an online service and requires a fast and stable internet connection. It's only available for F series or higher. While coding a high current charger is required. In the testing phase it will be free, later a license will be required to pay the server costs. Original Deep OBD adapters contain a license for coding of one vehicle. Do you want to continue?
Establish connection failed.\nPlease check your network connection.
Connection to the server failed.\nDo you want to try it again?

The connection to the vehicle is active.
When leaving the page the communication will be interrupted.
Please close the connection first.
Do you still want to leave the page?
The Bluetooth connection of the Android radios is not stable enough for coding.\nPlease use a smartphone instead.
The ELM327 adapters are not stable enough for coding.\nPlease use a Deep OBD, ENET or FTDI adapter.
Establishing of the encrypted connection failed, data will be transmitted unencrypted.
A communication error occurred.\nAdapter configuration is only possible,\nif the adapter LED is active after power on.
The Bluetooth pin must be at least 4 digits long
The UTF-8 Bluetooth name length invalid
The new Bluetooth pin {0} will get active after power cycle of the adapter
The new Bluetooth name will get active after power cycle of the adapter
A firmware update for the adapter is available.\nDo you want to install the update now?
During the update the communication should be never interrupted.\nDo you want to continue?

For the update it\'s required that the bootloader is already flashed into the device once.\nIf the application is not starting any more, you have to reset the processor during the connection phase, but the USB communication should not be interrupted.\nDo you want to continue?
The ELM327{0} compatible firmware is provided without any support.\nPlease read the original ELM327{0} documentation for more details.
Connecting to device, a processor reset may be required.
Firmware update in progress.\nDo not interrupt communication.
Firmware update failed.\nIf all adapter LEDs are active, the adapter is in bootloader mode and has to be flashed again for normal usage.
The firmware update was successful.\nYou should restart the adapter, afterwards you have to detect it again.
Your Android device is known to have an unreliable Bluetooth connection.\nPlease use a different device.
Connect to the vehicle in the app first.
The app has been displayed on the smartphone.
The error reset is already active.
The error reset has been started.
